entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow may affect the road Friday morning and 2 to 4 cm may accumulate above 800 metres. Further snow showers are possible to 900 metres through Friday afternoon but little if any snow is expected to accumulate on the road. Another period of snow is expected Friday evening.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow is expected to affect the road Friday morning and 3 to 5 cm of snow may settle near the summit, with lesser amounts down to 800 metres. Snow showers could continue through Friday afternoon but further accumulations are not expected until Friday evening.
